name: @blackwaves/admingen
description: Headless Admin Panel Framework for Elysia and Drizzle

scripts.build: bun run build:deps && bun run build:ui && bun run build:ts
scripts.build:deps: cd ../types && bun run build && cd ../adapter-drizzle && bun run build && cd ../admingen
scripts.build:ui: cd ../ui && bun run clean && bun run build && cd ../admingen && rm -rf ./ui-assets && mv ../ui/dist ./ui-assets
